channel.title: koRpus.lang.pt
channel.description: Adds support for the Portuguese language to the 'koRpus' package. To ask for help, report bugs, suggest feature improvements, or discuss the global development of the package, please consider subscribing to the koRpus-dev mailing list (<https://korpusml.reaktanz.de>).

item.title: Changes in koRpus.lang.pt version 0.1-3
item.description:
changed

  • renamed abbreviations and parameter files omitting the "-utf8" suffix

  • version number shortened by dropping a zero

  • updated README.md

  • removed methods from list of imported packages

  • replaced some non-ASCII characters in tag.class.def.punct with unicode escapes

added

  • support optional arguments for koRpus::set.lang.support()

  • a LICENSE file

item.title: Changes in koRpus.lang.pt version 0.01-2
item.description:
changed

  • adjusted koRpus dependency to >= 0.11-1

  • package was moved to the l10n repository on github

removed

  • hyphenation patterns: are now imported via the sylly.pt package
